entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 30 - Pilaf and the Mystery Force
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 30 - Pilaf and the Mystery Force20150909
This was a silly episode that just sets up the new villains and
reminds us of the old characters. I think it's great that the guy
has a whole chest full of fake Dragon Balls.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 31 - Wedding Plans?
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 31 - Wedding Plans?20150909
I like the character of Chi Chi and wonder if they really will
get married. It's great that the Ox King just knocks the dinosaur
out of the sky to eat it.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 32 - The Flying Fortress - Vanished!
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 32 - The Flying Fortress - Vanished!20150909
I like that Goku can just use his Kamehameha Wave to get out of
situations that previously tried him.

entry.content:

I played for a very short amount of time. I tried to take out the

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 28 - The Final Blow
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 28 - The Final Blow20150905
This was a very fun way to end the match. It's pretty absurd that
the Moon is just gone though. I wonder if they will do another
tournament in four years time in the show?
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 29 - The Roaming Lake
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 3 - Episode 29 - The Roaming Lake20150905
This was a pretty weak episode. There's nothing important that
happens in it, besides reminding us of some of the characters
from the tournament. The only interesting thing is that Goku can
easily do a Kamehameha to get something done.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Book: His Majesty's Dragon, by Naomi Novik (2006)
entry.content:
Book: His Majesty's Dragon, by Naomi Novik (2006)20150905
I really like this book. The world is so interesting and really
brings you in to it very quickly. I love the idea of dragons in the
age of the Napoleonic Wars. The writing is quite good and I find
the main character to be interesting. It is especially interesting
that the dragons talk and have personalities. I think it will do a
lot to make the story last.
  • Books
  • 2006

entry.title: Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (8)
entry.content:
Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (8)20150904
I did a little grinding and explored the rest of the Cathedral
Ward. I've upgraded my Holy Blade a lot as well. I fought the
Vicar and got it down to about 35 or 40%. I think that with a
little more practice I will take it down. My pattern tends to be
to fight it, get one level, then fight it again and repeat.

Total time: 14:04
  • Video Games
  • Bloodborne
  • PS4
  • 2015

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 27 - Number One Under the Moon?
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 27 - Number One Under the Moon?20150904
I like the way that Goku woke up because of dinner and I'll be
annoyed if Goku loses his tail again after only having it for one
day.

entry.title: Book: The Complete Sherlock Holmes, by Arthur Conan Doyle (1927) (4)
entry.content:
Book: The Complete Sherlock Holmes, by Arthur Conan Doyle (1927) (4)20150904
I finished the "Return" story. It was very cute and I'm curious how
long of a publishing interlude it was. It was a bit anti-climatic
to have him die and in the middle of the collection. It would have
been more effective had there been a few memorial stories of old
cases.
  • Books
  • 1927

entry.title: Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (7)
entry.content:
Game: Bloodborne (PS4, 2015) (7)20150903
I went through the whole area under the old workshop and had fun
exploring there. I died once and got caught by the Snatcher guy
and got put in the jail. I did a little bit of grinding, and I
think that's my main task right now so I can get the Holy Blade,
which will be about 3 times stronger than the axe I've been
using. I'll be getting ready to fight the boss in the Cathedral
Ward so I can move on.

Total time: 12:13
  • Video Games
  • Bloodborne
  • PS4
  • 2015

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 21 - Smells Like Trouble
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 21 - Smells Like Trouble20150903
The best part of this was when Goku said that Krillin doesn't
have a nose. He isn't drawn with one, but you just assume it is
implied.

entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 22 - Quaterfinals Begin20150903
The whole *REDACTED*ie Chun thing is ridiculous. It's cool to see
Roshi's power though. I feel a little bit bad for Yamcha.

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 23 - Monster Beast Giran
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 23 - Monster Beast Giran20150903
This episode was a bit of a let-down, because you think you are
going to see Goku fight, but really he just deals with a bunch of
lameness from Giran. It's cool that he has his tail back and
extra strength, though!
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 18 - The Turtle Hermit Way
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 18 - The Turtle Hermit Way20150902
This was a fun sequence because it reminds me of lots of kung-fu
movies where the trainee has to do some other thing that builds
up to their physical perfection. I think it was best when Goku
was able to move the rock already and when they had to put the
turtle shells on their backs.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball

entry.title: Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 19 - The Tournament Begins
entry.content:
Dragon Ball - Season 2 - Episode 19 - The Tournament Begins20150902
I like their uniforms and the way they jumped super high when
they took off their second round of turtle shells. It's so weird
that Launch had no character development or plot related to her
at all.
  • TV Shows
  • Dragon Ball
